name: devops-learning-dashboard
description: Simple static website for learning DevOps with environment-specific displays

scripts.start:dev: ENVIRONMENT=dev npm run build && http-server dist -p 8080 -o
scripts.start:staging: ENVIRONMENT=staging npm run build && http-server dist -p 8080 -o
scripts.start:preprod: ENVIRONMENT=preprod npm run build && http-server dist -p 8080 -o
scripts.start:production: ENVIRONMENT=production npm run build && http-server dist -p 8080 -o
